SELECT row_number() over(order by I.item_code) as num , I.item_code AS itemCode , I.item_name AS itemName , I.item_number AS itemNumber , I.have_number AS haveNumber , I.use_yn AS useYn , L.rt_state AS state FROM RENTAL_ITEM I LEFT JOIN RENTAL_LOG L ON I.item_code = L.item_code AND L.user_id = #{userId}
